Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 2. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 49 CH2. The VC is managed by the 'Association interprofessionnelle de l'absinthe' - which groups together all the legal distillers and growers of absinthe in the district, created in 2005 with the legalisation of the production and consumption of the product. To be able to sell the product, it is necessary to carry out a self-control and to obtain a patent delivered by the canton.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Jura. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Val-de-Travers. The MLR is a region composed of limestone rocks, which are permeable and have difficulty retaining water, forming a succession of shallow valleys and high plateaus. It is covered by forest and wooded pasture. Milk and cheese production are the first agricultural resource of the massif. Temperature vary strongly between summer and winter and the annual rainfall are abundant ( 1000 mm). Clock-making by farmers in the form of peasant clockmakers has been practiced since the Middle Ages and offers a cultural heritage to the region.   The size of the area (km2) is 12.47.
